HomePage.title: SoFLEX: Lend and Borrow
HomePage.description: SoFLEX introduces a comprehensive solution for lending and borrowing compressed NFTs and synthetic assets within the Solana ecosystem, addressing the increasing demand for liquidity and financial flexibility while empowering users to leverage assets efficiently and securely.
HomePage.reasonDesc1: Connect directly with other users to buy, lend, or borrow compressed NFTs and synthetic assets, fostering a vibrant marketplace for asset exchange. Borrowers can secure SOL token loans using their assets as collateral, while lenders can set competitive interest rates or bid on lending amounts.
HomePage.reasonDesc2: Engage in lending and borrowing activities against protocol-managed liquidity pools, enhancing liquidity and earning opportunities in the Solana ecosystem.
HomePage.reasonDesc3: Enjoy the flexibility to borrow SOL tokens against compressed NFT and synthetic asset holdings, or vice versa, without liquidating assets. This feature provides alternative investment opportunities for SOL token holders and convenient liquidity access for asset owners.
HomePage.reasonDesc4: Tailored interest rates cater to both borrowers and lenders, ensuring accessibility and profitability. Borrowers benefit from low rates (5%-10%), while lenders can earn attractive yields (30%-70%) on compressed NFT and synthetic assets.
HomePage.reasonDesc5: Built on the Solana blockchain, our platform ensures secure, transparent, and immutable transactions. Smart contracts govern lending and borrowing activities, offering users trustless access to financial services.
HomePage.reasonDesc6: Utilize AI algorithms to analyze user data, transaction history, and asset characteristics for accurate credit assessments and risk profiling. AI enhances lending decisions by evaluating factors like repayment history and market trends, mitigating default risks.
HomePage.reasonDesc7: Optimize asset allocation, rebalancing strategies, and risk management techniques with AI-driven portfolio management tools. Analyze portfolio performance and market trends to maximize returns while minimizing risks for NFT and synthetic asset portfolios.
HomePage.reasonDesc8: Empower compressed NFT and synthetic asset holders to monetize assets and access liquidity without selling, while providing SOL token holders with passive income opportunities. Our platform promotes financial inclusion and fosters innovation in the dynamic world of decentralized finance on Solana.

ContactUsPage.title: Let's talk about everything!

FAQsPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQsPage.ans1: SoFLEX is a platform built on Solana that facilitates lending and borrowing activities with compressed NFTs and synthetic assets. It offers a comprehensive solution to meet the liquidity needs within the Solana ecosystem.
FAQsPage.ans2: SoFLEX operates on a peer-to-peer (P2P) and peer-to-pool model. Users can lend, borrow, or buy compressed NFTs and synthetic assets directly from other users or participate in pool-managed lending and borrowing against liquidity pools.
FAQsPage.quest3: What assets can I lend or borrow on SoFLEX?
FAQsPage.ans3: SoFLEX allows users to engage with various compressed NFTs and synthetic assets within the Solana ecosystem. Users can borrow SOL tokens against their assets or vice versa, providing flexibility in accessing liquidity.
FAQsPage.quest4: What are the interest rates offered on SoFLEX?
FAQsPage.ans4: SoFLEX offers competitive interest rates tailored to both borrowers and lenders. Borrowers can access loans at rates ranging from 5% to 10%, while lenders can earn yields ranging from 30% to 70% on their assets.
FAQsPage.quest5: How does SoFLEX ensure security and transparency?
FAQsPage.ans5: SoFLEX leverages the security features of the Solana blockchain, ensuring the immutability and transparency of all transactions. Smart contracts govern lending and borrowing activities, providing users with trustless and reliable access to financial services.
FAQsPage.quest6: Does SoFLEX offer any additional features?
FAQsPage.ans6: Yes, SoFLEX incorporates AI-powered credit assessment and portfolio management tools. These features enhance lending decisions by analyzing user data, transaction history, and asset characteristics, while also optimizing asset allocation and risk management strategies for users' portfolios.
FAQsPage.quest7: What are the benefits of using SoFLEX?
FAQsPage.ans7: SoFLEX empowers users to monetize their assets without selling, offers passive income opportunities for SOL token holders, enhances liquidity in the Solana ecosystem, and promotes financial inclusion by providing accessible lending solutions globally.
FAQsPage.quest8: How can I get started with SoFLEX?
FAQsPage.ans8: To get started with SoFLEX, simply sign up for an account on the platform and connect your Solana wallet. From there, you can explore lending, borrowing, and trading activities with compressed NFTs and synthetic assets.
FAQsPage.quest9: Is SoFLEX suitable for both experienced investors and newcomers?
FAQsPage.ans9: Yes, SoFLEX caters to a diverse range of users, from seasoned investors to newcomers in the compressed NFT and synthetic asset space. The platform provides the necessary tools and resources for users to thrive in decentralized finance on Solana.
FAQsPage.quest10: Where can I learn more about SoFLEX?
FAQsPage.ans10: For more information about SoFLEX, including detailed guides, tutorials, and updates, visit our website or join our community channels on social media platforms.
FAQsPage.quest11: How can I contact SoFLEX support?
FAQsPage.ans11a: For any inquiries or support, you can reach out to SoFLEX's customer support team through the provided contact details on the platform. Additionally, you can contact us by submitting the form on the
FAQsPage.ans11c: or feel free to send us an email at
FAQsPage.ans11d: Our team is ready to assist you with any questions or concerns.

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.description: Thank you for choosing SoFLEX. This Privacy Policy describes how SoFLEX ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and shares your information when you use our platform. By accessing or using SoFLEX, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.
PrivacyPage.section1Content1: We may collect the following types of information when you use SoFLEX:
PrivacyPage.section1Content2: Personal Information: Information that can be used to identify you, such as your name, email address, and payment information.
PrivacyPage.section1Content3: Usage Information: Information about how you interact with SoFLEX, including your loan history and cookies.
PrivacyPage.section2Content1: We may use the information we collect for the following purposes:
PrivacyPage.section2Content3: To process transactions and provide customer support.
PrivacyPage.section2Content4: To personalize your experience and improve our services.
PrivacyPage.section2Content5: To communicate with you about updates, promotions, and other relevant information.
PrivacyPage.section3Content1: We may share your information with third parties under the following circumstances:
PrivacyPage.section3Content2: With your consent or at your direction.
PrivacyPage.section3Content3: With service providers who assist us in operating SoFLEX and delivering our services.
PrivacyPage.section3Content4: When required by law or to protect our rights and safety.
PrivacyPage.section4Content1: We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. However, please be aware that no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure.
PrivacyPage.section5Content1: SoFLEX may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not operated by us. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of these third parties.
PrivacyPage.section6Content1: SoFLEX is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe we have inadvertently collected such information, please contact us immediately.
PrivacyPage.section7Content1: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
PrivacyPage.contactDesc: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
PrivacyPage.acceptPrivacy: By using SoFLEX, you consent to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Thank you for trusting SoFLEX with your information.

ToSPage.title: Terms of Service
ToSPage.description: Welcome to SoFLEX! These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of the SoFLEX platform ("Platform"), provided by SoFLEX Inc. ("SoFLEX," "we," "us," or "our"). By accessing or using our Platform, you agree to comply with these Terms. Please read them carefully before using our services.
ToSPage.section1Content1: By accessing or using the SoFLEX Platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you may not access or use our Platform.
ToSPage.section2Content1: SoFLEX provides a comprehensive solution for lending and borrowing compressed NFTs and synthetic assets within the Solana ecosystem. Our Platform enables users to leverage their assets efficiently, whether for accessing funds or earning passive income through lending. We facilitate both peer-to-peer and peer-to-pool transactions in a seamless and secure environment.
ToSPage.section3Content1: You must be at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms to access and use the SoFLEX Platform. By accessing or using our services, you represent and warrant that you meet these eligibility requirements.
ToSPage.section4Content1: To access certain features of the SoFLEX Platform, you may need to create a user account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security.
ToSPage.section5Content1: When using the SoFLEX Platform, you agree not to engage in any of the following prohibited activities:
ToSPage.section5Content2: a. Violating any applicable laws or regulations.
ToSPage.section5Content3: b. Impersonating any person or entity.
ToSPage.section5Content4: c. Interfering with the proper functioning of the Platform.
ToSPage.section5Content5: d. Engaging in fraudulent or deceptive activities.
ToSPage.section5Content6: e. Breaching the security or integrity of the Platform.
ToSPage.section5Content7: f. Using the Platform for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
ToSPage.section6Content1: All content and materials available on the SoFLEX Platform, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, are the intellectual property of SoFLEX or its licensors. You may not use, reproduce, modify, or distribute any content from the Platform without prior written consent from SoFLEX.
ToSPage.section7Content1: The SoFLEX Platform is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis, without any warranties of any kind, express or implied. SoFLEX makes no representations or warranties regarding the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of any information or content available on the Platform.
ToSPage.section8Content1: To the fullest extent permitted by law, SoFLEX shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or related to your use of the SoFLEX Platform. In no event shall SoFLEX's total liability exceed the amount paid by you, if any, for accessing or using the Platform.
ToSPage.section9Content1: You agree to indemnify and hold SoFLEX harmless from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, costs, or expenses arising out of or related to your use of the SoFLEX Platform or any violation of these Terms.
ToSPage.section10Content1: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of Denver, without regard to its conflict of law principles.
ToSPage.section11Content1: SoFLEX reserves the right to modify or update these Terms at any time without prior notice. Your continued use of the Platform after any such changes constitutes your acceptance of the modified Terms.
ToSPage.contactDesc: If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms or the SoFLEX Platform, please contact us at
ToSPage.acceptTos: By accessing or using the SoFLEX Platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms. Thank you for using SoFLEX!

UAPage.title: User Agreement
UAPage.description: Welcome to SoFLEX! This User Agreement ("Agreement") governs your use of the SoFLEX platform (the "Platform"), provided by SoFLEX Inc. ("SoFLEX," "we," "us," or "our"). By accessing or using the Platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by this Agreement. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not access or use the Platform.
UAPage.section1Content1: The SoFLEX platform facilitates lending and borrowing activities involving compressed NFTs and synthetic assets within the Solana ecosystem. Our Platform offers a comprehensive solution to address the liquidity and financial flexibility needs of users in the compressed NFT and synthetic asset space. Whether you are looking to access funds or earn passive income through lending, SoFLEX provides a secure and seamless environment to meet your financial objectives. We support both peer-to-peer and peer-to-pool transactions.
UAPage.section2Content1: To access certain features of the Platform, you may be required to register for an account. By registering, you agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information about yourself. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.
UAPage.section3Content1: a. You agree to use the Platform only for lawful purposes and in accordance with this Agreement.
UAPage.section3Content2: b. You agree not to engage in any activity that interferes with or disrupts the operation of the Platform or any servers or networks connected to the Platform.
UAPage.section3Content3: c. You acknowledge that SoFLEX does not provide financial advice, and any decisions you make based on information obtained from the Platform are at your own risk.
UAPage.section3Content4: d. You agree not to use the Platform for any fraudulent or illegal purposes.
UAPage.section4Content1: All content and materials available on the Platform, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, are the property of SoFLEX or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws.
UAPage.section5Content1: Your use of the Platform is subject to our Privacy Policy, which describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information. By using the Platform, you consent to the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information as described in the Privacy Policy.
UAPage.section6Content1: THE PLATFORM IS PROVIDED ON AN "AS-IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS, WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. SOFLEX DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.
UAPage.section7Content1: TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, SOFLEX SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH YOUR USE OF THE PLATFORM.
UAPage.section8Content1: You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless SoFLEX and its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, agents, and licensors from and against any and all claims, liabilities, expenses, damages, and costs, including reasonable attorneys' fees, arising out of or in any way connected with your use of the Platform or your violation of this Agreement.
UAPage.section9Content1: This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where SoFLEX is located, without giving effect to any principles of conflicts of law.
UAPage.section10Content1: SoFLEX reserves the right to modify or update this Agreement at any time. We will notify you of any material changes to this Agreement by posting the updated version on the Platform. Your continued use of the Platform after such modifications will constitute your acceptance of the revised Agreement.
UAPage.contactDesc: If you have any questions or concerns about this Agreement, please contact us at
UAPage.acceptUA: By accessing or using the Platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by this Agreement.

BorrowPage.title: Explore Borrowing Options on SoFLEX
BorrowPage.description: Discover flexible borrowing solutions tailored to your needs on SoFLEX. Access decentralized finance (DeFi) through peer-to-pool opportunities or dive into peer-to-peer (P2P) borrowing. Whether you're seeking direct lending from peers or exploring DeFi protocols, SoFLEX provides a seamless experience for accessing funds through your compressed NFTs and synthetic assets within the Solana ecosystem.

LendPage.title: Unlock Lending Opportunities on SoFLEX
LendPage.description: Unlock opportunities to earn yields by lending your assets on SoFLEX. Engage in decentralized finance (DeFi) lending for peer-to-pool engagements or participate in peer-to-peer (P2P) lending. Whether you're interested in DeFi protocols or direct lending to peers, SoFLEX provides a secure platform for maximizing returns on your assets within the Solana ecosystem.

CheckCreditScorePage.infoCardMessage: Connect your wallet to view your On-Chain Credit Score.
CheckCreditScorePage.title: My On-Chain Credit Score
CheckCreditScorePage.transactionHistoryError: An error occurred while fetching your transaction history. Please try again.
CheckCreditScorePage.updateCreditScoreError: An error occurred while updating your credit score. Please try again.
CheckCreditScorePage.formulaUsed: Formula used = a * BH + b * (TH + CD) + c
CheckCreditScorePage.formula1: BH: Borrower History Score (0-100) - Analyzes past borrowing and repayment behavior.
CheckCreditScorePage.formula2: TH: Transaction History Score (0-100) - Derived from overall on-chain activity such as transaction frequency and volume.
CheckCreditScorePage.formula3: CD: Collateral Diversity Score (0-100) - Assesses the risk profile of the collateral used for the loan, including its liquidity.
CheckCreditScorePage.formula5: Coefficient b: 0.35 - Weight on combined TH + CD
CheckCreditScorePage.formula6: Coefficient c: 30 - Constant value to adjust the score range
